name: AIRTABLE__LIST_BASES
description: List all bases in Airtable that the user has access to

offset.description: Pagination offset. Use the offset returned in the previous response to fetch the next page of records.

name: AIRTABLE__GET_BASE_SCHEMA
description: Get the schema of tables in a specific base

base_id.description: ID of the base to retrieve tables from

include.description: If specified, additional fields to include in the views object response; currently, this list only allows a single literal value 'visibleFieldIds' (for views of type grid only)

name: AIRTABLE__CREATE_TABLE
description: Create a new table in a specific base

base_id.description: ID of the base to create a table in

fields.description: Fields to create in the new table. A list of JSON objects representing the fields in the table.

options.description: Additional options for the field based on its type

precision.description: For number fields, the number of digits after the decimal point

symbol.description: For currency fields, the currency symbol to use (e.g., '$')

choices.description: For singleSelect and multipleSelects fields, the list of available options

dateFormat.description: For date fields, the format of the date

timeFormat.description: For dateTime fields, the format of the time

timeZone.description: For dateTime fields, the time zone (e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles', 'UTC')

foreignTableId.description: For multipleRecordLinks fields, the ID of the linked table

inverseForeignTableId.description: For lookup fields, the ID of the table to look up from

inverseForeignFieldId.description: For lookup fields, the ID of the field to look up from

relationship.description: For multipleRecordLinks fields, the relationship type

symmetricColumnId.description: For multipleRecordLinks fields, the ID of the symmetric field in the linked table

isReversed.description: For multipleRecordLinks fields, whether the relationship is reversed

formula.description: For formula fields, the formula expression

max.description: For rating fields, the maximum rating value

icon.description: Icon identifier for fields like checkbox (e.g., 'check', 'x')

primaryFieldId.description: ID of the field to use as the primary field (optional)

name: AIRTABLE__LIST_WEBHOOKS
description: List all webhooks for a specific base

base_id.description: ID of the base to retrieve webhooks from

name: AIRTABLE__UPDATE_TABLE
description: Update an existing table in a specific base

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the table

table_id.description: ID of the table to update

name: AIRTABLE__LIST_RECORDS
description: List records in a table with filtering, sorting, and pagination options.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

maxRecords.description: Maximum number of records to return

view.description: View name or ID to use

name: AIRTABLE__CREATE_RECORDS
description: Create one or more records in a table with field data.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

name: AIRTABLE__UPDATE_RECORDS
description: Update one or more existing records in a table with new field data.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

name: AIRTABLE__DELETE_RECORDS
description: Delete one or more records from a table by their record IDs.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

records[].description: Array of record IDs to delete

name: AIRTABLE__GET_RECORD
description: Retrieve a specific record from a table by its ID.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

record_id.description: ID of the record to retrieve

name: AIRTABLE__DELETE_TABLE
description: Delete a table from a specific base in Airtable permanently.

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the table

table_id.description: ID of the table to delete

name: AIRTABLE__CREATE_FIELD
description: Create a new field in an existing table with specific type and configuration.

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the table

table_id.description: ID of the table to create field in

options.description: Additional options for the field based on its type

name: AIRTABLE__UPDATE_FIELD
description: Update an existing field in a table with new configuration or properties.

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the table

table_id.description: ID of the table containing the field

field_id.description: ID of the field to update

name: AIRTABLE__CREATE_WEBHOOK
description: Create a new webhook for a base to receive real-time notifications when records are modified.

base_id.description: ID of the base to create webhook for

notificationUrl.description: URL to send webhook notifications to

specification.description: Webhook specification defining what triggers notifications

dataTypes.description: Types of data changes to track

recordChangeScope.description: Scope of record changes to track

name: AIRTABLE__DELETE_WEBHOOK
description: Delete an existing webhook from a base to stop receiving notifications.

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the webhook

webhook_id.description: ID of the webhook to delete

name: AIRTABLE__GET_WEBHOOK_PAYLOADS
description: Retrieve webhook payload history for a specific webhook to track triggered events.

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the webhook

webhook_id.description: ID of the webhook to get payloads for

query.description: Query parameters for filtering webhook payloads

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for retrieving next set of payloads

limit.description: Maximum number of payloads to return

name: AIRTABLE__SEARCH_RECORDS
description: Search for records across multiple tables in a base using text search and filters.

base_id.description: ID of the base to search in

tableIdOrName.description: ID or name of table to search

requests.description: Array of search requests across tables

name: AIRTABLE__CREATE_VIEW
description: Create a new view in a table for organizing and filtering data display.

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the table

table_id.description: ID of the table to create view in

name: AIRTABLE__UPDATE_VIEW
description: Update an existing view in a table to modify its configuration, filters, or sorting.

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the table

table_id.description: ID of the table containing the view

view_id.description: ID of the view to update

name: AIRTABLE__DELETE_VIEW
description: Delete a view from a table to remove custom data organization and filters.

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the table

table_id.description: ID of the table containing the view

view_id.description: ID of the view to delete

name: AIRTABLE__BATCH_UPDATE_RECORDS
description: Perform bulk update operations on multiple records efficiently using batch processing.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

records.description: Array of records to update (up to 10)

name: AIRTABLE__GET_ATTACHMENTS
description: Retrieve file attachments from records in a table for document and media management.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

record_id.description: ID of the record containing attachments

name: AIRTABLE__CREATE_COMMENT
description: Add a comment to a specific record for team collaboration and communication.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

record_id.description: ID of the record to comment on

name: AIRTABLE__LIST_COMMENTS
description: Retrieve all comments for a specific record to track collaboration history.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

record_id.description: ID of the record to get comments for

name: AIRTABLE__UPDATE_COMMENT
description: Update the text content of an existing comment on a record.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

record_id.description: ID of the record containing the comment

comment_id.description: ID of the comment to update

name: AIRTABLE__DELETE_COMMENT
description: Delete a comment from a record to remove collaboration notes.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

record_id.description: ID of the record containing the comment

comment_id.description: ID of the comment to delete

name: AIRTABLE__CREATE_BASE
description: Create a new base workspace for organizing related tables and data.

workspaceId.description: ID of the workspace to create the base in

tables.description: Initial tables to create in the base

fields.description: Fields to create in the table

name: AIRTABLE__LIST_COLLABORATORS
description: List all collaborators with access to a base including their roles and permissions.

base_id.description: ID of the base to list collaborators for

name: AIRTABLE__GET_WORKSPACE
description: Retrieve workspace information including access permissions and base organization.

workspace_id.description: ID of the workspace to retrieve

name: AIRTABLE__LIST_WORKSPACES
description: List all workspaces accessible to the authenticated user for organization management.

include.description: Additional information to include in response

name: AIRTABLE__DUPLICATE_TABLE
description: Duplicate an existing table within a base including its structure and data.

base_id.description: ID of the base containing the table

table_id.description: ID of the table to duplicate

includeData.description: Whether to include existing records in the duplicate

name: AIRTABLE__GET_BASE_COLLABORATORS
description: Retrieve detailed information about collaborators in a specific base.

base_id.description: ID of the base to get collaborators for

name: AIRTABLE__BATCH_CREATE_RECORDS
description: Create multiple records efficiently using batch processing for large data imports.

base_id.description: ID of the base

table_id_or_name.description: ID or name of the table

records.description: Array of records to create (up to 10 per request)
